Backend Namespaces

The backend of MicroM is organized into several namespaces. Each namespace groups related functionality and has its own dedicated documentation.

For step-by-step learning materials, see the Tutorials section.

Configuration

Handles application and database configuration options. Documentation

Core

Provides base classes for entities, actions, and initialization helpers. Documentation

Data

Implements the data layer for CRUD operations, filtering, and lookups. Documentation

DataDictionary

Defines metadata for entities, menus, and security configuration. Documentation

Database

Tools for creating, updating, and managing the database schema. Documentation

Excel

Utilities for working with Excel exports. Documentation

Extensions

Common extension methods used throughout the framework. Documentation

Generators

Code and SQL generation for backend and frontend components. Documentation

ImportData

Services for parsing and importing data from external sources. Documentation

Validators

Validation helpers for entities and input data. Documentation

Web

Web API controllers, services, and authentication utilities. Documentation

Tutorials

Guides and walkthroughs for using the backend. Documentation
